tool_description: A meatier lorem ipsum generator. Does your lorem ipsum text long for something a little meatier? Give our generator a try… it’s tasty!
name: Bacon Ipsum
title: Bacon Ipsum

api_list.name: Baconized Ipsum

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: all-meat for meat only or meat-and-filler for meat mixed with miscellaneous ‘lorem ipsum’ filler.

optional_parameters.name: start-with-lorem
optional_parameters.description: pass 1 to start the first paragraph with ‘Bacon ipsum dolor sit amet’.
